field.val: NONHISP0 2000 Persons not of Hisp./Latino origin
ADULT0 2000 Prop. of persons who are adults 18+ years old
CHILD0 2000 Prop. of persons who are children under 18 years old
OLD0 2000 Prop. of persons who are 65+ years old
KIDS0 2000 Prop. of persons who are children under 5 years old
FFH0N 2000 Female-headed families and subfamilies with own children
FFH0D 2000 Total families and subfamilies with own children
FFH0 2000 Prop. of families and subfamilies with own children who are female-headed
SMHSE0N 2000 Persons 5+ years old residing in the same house five years ago
SMHSE0 2000 Prop. of persons 5+ years old residing in the same house five years ago
EDUC80 2000 Persons 25+ years old who have competed 0-8 years of school
EDUC110 2000 Persons 25+ years old who have completed 9-12 years of school but no diploma
EDUC120 2000 Persons 25+ years old who have completed h.s. but no college
EDUC150 2000 Persons 25+ years old who have completed some college but no degree
EDUCA0 2000 Persons 25+ years old who have an associate degree but no bachelors degree
EDUC160 2000 Persons 25+ years old who have a bachelors or graduate/professional degree
HSDROP0N 2000 Persons 16-19 years old neither enrolled in nor graduated from h.s.
HSDROP0 2000 Prop. of persons 16-19 years old neither enrolled in nor graduated from h.s.
INDEMP0 2000 Civilian employed persons 16+ years old
OCC10 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed in professional and technical occupations
OCC20 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed as executives, managers, and administrators (excl. farms)
OCC30 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed as sales workers
OCC40 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed as administrative support and clerical workers
OCC50 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed as precision production, craft, and repair workers
OCC60 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed as operators, assemblers, transportation, and material moving workers
OCC70 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed as nonfarm laborers
OCC80 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed as service workers
OCC90 2000 Persons 16+ years old employed as farm workers or in forestry and fishing
UNEMPT0N 2000 Persons 16+ years old in the civilian labor force and unemployed
UNEMPT0D 2000 Persons 16+ years old in the civilian labor force
UNEMPRT0 2000 Prop. of persons 16+ years old who are in the civilian labor force and unemployed
POVRAT0N 2000 Total persons below the poverty level last year
POVRAT0D 2000 Total population with poverty status determined
POVRAT0 2000 Prop. of total persons below the poverty level last year
WELFAR0N 2000 Households with public assistance inc. (incl. SSI) last year
WELFARE0 2000 Prop. of HHs with public assistance inc. last year
MDFAMY0 2000 Median family inc. last year ($)
AVHHIN0N 2000 Aggregate HH inc. last year ($)
AVHHIN0 2000 Average HH inc. last year ($)
MDHHY0 2000 Median HH inc. last year ($)
BLTOC390 2000 Occupied housing units built 1939 or earlier
